text: εἴπερειπερ f35 C [99%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ ει (𝕻72)ℵA,B [1%] NU ἐγεύσασθε ὅτι χρηστὸςχρηστος f35 ℵA,B,C [48%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP,NU ¦ χριστος 𝕻72 [52%] (The change from ‘gracious’ to ‘Christ’ is so obvious as to be almost involuntary; if ‘Christ’ were original it is scarcely credible that anyone would change it to ‘gracious’.) ὁ Κύριος.
